ygData.subject: RE: Saving Private Sereph + Guk stuff(all must read the Guk part!!!)
ygData.msgSnippet: I noriced even with more than enuff to share, looter still get more than half.  Eg, when I loot a 2pp birdman, my buddy (only 2 of us in a team) only get less
ygData.messageBody:
I noriced even with more than enuff to share, looter still get more than
half. Eg, when I loot a 2pp birdman, my buddy (only 2 of us in a team)
only get less than 5gp ;) Tested and certified true.

Ziltus (on his way to Master of All Trades and smelling the 7th circle
spells from far)


On Saturday, 24 July, 1999 9:55 AM, Leshrec [SMTP:leshrec@...]
wrote:
> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> Some figures which might help confusion..
> 1. XP bonus in FULL group supposed to be 25% more and if its a dungeon
like
> GUK, then have 25% additional bonus which adds up to 50%
> 2. The autosplit doesn't split TOTAL cash, it just splits coins, so if
lets
> say got 6pp and there are 6 ppl in group, it will be 1pp each. 12 gold =
2
> gold per person, But if there is 7 gold, then the person who loots it get
2
> gold, and the remainder 5 gold goes to the party, with 1 gold to each
> person.This applies to copper and silver too, therefore usually receiving
1
> copper cause copper is the most common coin found on the mob.
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Sunday, July 25, 1999 2:54 AM
> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Saving Private Sereph + Guk stuff(all must
read
> the Guk part!!!)
>
>
> >From: hans ng <nahemah@...>
> >
> >team up got xp bouns meh?how it works out?about auto split...its not a
> >bug but rather bcos if there r 6 ppl in group and there is only 3 gold
> >on the corpse theres no way to divide it so the looter gets it all....
> >
> >
> >LKW wrote:
> >>
> >> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >>
> >> > Next, int value of these nukers, so that I can plan what time you
guys
> >> > should nuke (remember guk has a high spawn rate. Nuking on site is
too
> >> > mana ineffective)
> >> > Ziltus
> >>
> >> Sigh, as I've said many times, I regret putting 20 stats point on STR
> when
> >> I create Ziltus, for f**k? Knn I'm not creating a labour worker ;(
> >> Anyway, my buffed INT is 111.
> >> Kellendil, what are the best INT stuffs u can make now? I need them
> badly,
> >> esp earrings (wtf I'm wearing AGI earring? I'm not a sand bag, hehe).
> >>
> >> > Wis base casters don't need to report. See your face knows how much
> mana
> >> > you have already.
> >>
> >> Hahahahahaahahaha!
> >>
> >> > Function of this guy? If a big train is started, this guy will be
> >> > responsible of taunting the WHOLE train, and die, while the rest
> >> > gate/run out.
> >>
> >> Monk willl be the best candidate since they can feign death, plus they
> >> carry very few items. So cannot retrieve coprse also nmind, hahahahah
> ;-P
> >>
> >> > For the 20+ group, I'll volunteer for this since I get a incredible
50%
> >> > exp bonus while in a full group and my area effect DOT songs can
taunt
> >> > like no tomorrow. For the other 2, decide who gets to die among
> >> > yourself.
> >>
> >> Huh? Not 25% extra xp bonus meh? 50%?
> >>
> >> > Now on supplies. The 2 magician and 3(2 if Neriss go MIA) wis base
> >> > casters will be required to provide enought supplies to last the
whole
> >> > gang. Nicademous, Kenven and Kellendil can help them out by going
into
> >> > Grobb and I and Sunblade can forage a bit to help out.
> >>
> >> Actually if possible, I would like to bring flyingfox (lvl 21 magi),
> >> deadflower (lvl 19 bard) and Ling (lvl 24 wiz) along. They are my
hunting
> >> buddies for pretty long time and very trust-worthy. Of coz, priority
> will
> >> be given to locals 1st, just in case we have slots to put them in ;)
> >>
> >> > Spell casters, please remember to get 100 each of your spell
> components.
> >> > 200+ for pet reagents to be KS.
> >>
> >> 100??? How long we going to stay there? I buy 40 of my spell
reagents
> >> each time and can last for a week or so. Wt and cost is one thing.
I'm
> so
> >> damn poor after buying the 5 lvl 24 teleport scrolls and in the end
have
> to
> >> borrow money from Ling to get the 5th scroll, where got cash to buy so
> many
> >> cat eye agate? ;(
> >>
> >> > No alpha loot will be in place. Instead, auto split will be turn on,
> and
> >> > 1 person of each group will be delicated to looting everything.
Please
> >> > report whatever you get to all 3 groups. We will decide by vote who
> >> > requires the item the most and hand it to him/her first.
> >>
> >> Sugestion: I'm not sure how this single looter works, but sometime
pple
> dun
> >> bother to loot those rusty weaps and cheap stuffs. It's also
impractical
> >> for the single looter to loot everything on sight. Maybe looters just
> loot
> >> those better stuffs and leave the cheapo stuffs like rusty for others
to
> >> free loot (poor wise like me even loot animal skin or bat wing leh).
FYI,
> >> even if auto split is turn on, auto split DO NOT split the coin
evenly.
> >> The person who loot the coins will be much more than other individ
uals
> in
> >> the group, not sure if this is a bug but 101% confirm.
> >>
> >> > This event will be a 2 day, 3 night event. We will make our way to
guk
> >> > on Saturday night and fight from Saturday night to National day.
When
> TV
> >> > showing fire works, those present will atempt to choing the frogloc
> >> > paladin if we gather enough force, and no one is camping the goon.
> >>
> >> I hope I can join most of the time, Aug is a very heavy work load
month
> for
> >> me. Maybe have to work on National Day ;(
> >>
> >> Ziltus, power training at Lake Rathetear for the coming Guk
expedition.
